br.uff.midiacom.ana.rule
Class NCLCompositeRule<T extends NCLTestRule>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.rule.NCLCompositeRule<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, NCLTestRule<T>, java.lang.Comparable<T>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLCompositeRule<T extends NCLTestRule>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement
implements NCLTestRule<T>

Esta classe define uma regra de teste composta da Nested Context Language (NCL).

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
